clues.text: Bill Clinton awarded this political rival the Presidential Medal of Freedom in 1997

You beta know that this letter follows upsilon in the Greek alphabet

The name of this Egyptian island is Greek for "lighthouse"
The highest low temperature of any U.S. state is the 12 degrees F. recorded in this state on May 17, 1979
On a weather map, 3 horizontal & parallel lines indicate this weather condition
The Fujita scale that ranks the intensity of these goes from F-0 on up; an F-5 has wind speeds exceeding 261 mph

We swear, the very first law passed by Congress concerned how these pledges were to be made

Former senators are allowed back on the Senate floor, but they're restricted from doing this the first year out of office

rounds.comments: (Alex: You have to identify the country that is hidden within each clue, and I'll tell you now that the letters are in order.)

rounds.comments: (Alex: These are all based on words that end in "O-L".  For instance, if we were saying "It's the study of pistols," that would be "pistology".  That's the new kind of -ology.)
